name: Moore
title: Moore cluster data package
description: Data package for the Moore cluster

contributors.title: Anna Cresswell
contributors.description: Updated spatial data (reduced number of sites, updated k and site areas).

contributors.title: Takuya Iwanaga
contributors.description: Packaged data and generated initial coral covers.

resources.name: spatial_data
resources.description: spatial data of cluster. Unique sites indicated by reef_siteid. Zone types under zone_type.

resources.name: coral_cover
resources.description: Initial coral cover. Matching reefs indicated by reef_siteid. Based on coral cover data from IPMF. Note: This data is based on older dataset and needs to be updated.

resources.name: DHWs
resources.description: Stochastic degree heating week data for the Moore Cluster. Includes data for RCPs 2.6, 4.5, 6.0, 8.5

resources.name: waves
resources.description: Stochastic wave data for the Moore cluster. Empty datasets for RCPs 2.6, 4.5, 6.0, 8.5

resources.name: connectivity
resources.description: Connectivity data for specific days across years, grouped by year
